com.mingsoft.people.biz.impl

类 PeopleBizImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mingsoft.base.biz.impl.BaseBizImpl
      • com.mingsoft.people.biz.impl.PeopleBizImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.mingsoft.base.biz.IBaseBiz, IPeopleBiz
    直接已知子类:
    PeopleStudentBizImpl, PeopleUserBizImpl

    @Service(value="peopleBiz")
public class PeopleBizImpl
extends com.mingsoft.base.biz.impl.BaseBizImpl
implements IPeopleBiz
